posts.postText: I mean Dick Nixon, where has he gone? He hasn't been on in over 3 weeks. Anyone know what happened?
He said there was a death in the family. I'm not sure though.

>> He  said  there was a death in the family. I'm not sure though. 
You think he would lie about stuff like that, you are a terrible human bean.
 http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_yL096-TdCC4/Ro_-tL1geAI/AAAAAAAAAH0/sTG1pon2JnI/s400/Human+Bean.gif 
His family is dead and you don't believe him? Give him some time, he does this out of his heart and you expect this?

>> >> He  said  there was a death in the family. I'm not sure though. 
You think he would lie about stuff like that, you are a terrible human bean.
 http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_yL096-TdCC4/Ro_-tL1geAI/AAAAAAAAAH0/sTG1pon2JnI/s400/Human+Bean.gif  

-.- I meant I'm not sure if that's the reason he is still gone.
Because I thought Pharaoh thought Dick was lying.

wtf u guys talking about he dont have any death in his family ... hes only busy with school and work though... and on top of that snow shovelling (lol)

B4 saying things liek that you could ASK.. him >_>

So I was just putting it out there that it might be the reason he is still gone.
